class.name: GodotDojoHelper
class.description: The GodotDojoHelper class provides utility methods for converting data types, accessing settings, and managing logging within the Godot-Dojo integration.

method.name: double_to_variant_fp
method.description: Converts a double value to a fixed-point variant.

method.name: fixed_to_float
method.description: Converts a fixed-point value to a float.

method.name: fixed_to_float_64
method.description: Converts a 64-bit fixed-point value to a float.

method.name: fixed_to_float_128
method.description: Converts a 128-bit fixed-point value to a float.

method.name: fixed_to_float_256
method.description: Converts a 256-bit fixed-point value to a float.

method.name: float_to_fixed
method.description: Converts a float value to a fixed-point integer.

method.name: float_to_fixed_64
method.description: Converts a float value to a 64-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: float_to_fixed_128
method.description: Converts a float value to a 128-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: float_to_fixed_256
method.description: Converts a float value to a 256-bit fixed-point integer.

method.name: get_custom_setting
method.description: Retrieves a custom setting from the project settings.

method.name: get_dojo_setting
method.description: Retrieves a Dojo-specific setting from the project settings.

method.name: get_katana_url
method.description: Retrieves the Katana URL from the project settings.

method.name: get_log_level_enabled
method.description: Checks if a specific log level is enabled.

method.name: get_policies
method.description: Retrieves the policies configuration.

method.name: get_setting
method.description: Retrieves a general setting from the project settings.

method.name: get_torii_setting
method.description: Retrieves a Torii-specific setting from the project settings.

method.name: set_debug_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables debug logging.

method.name: set_error_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables error logging.

method.name: set_info_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables info logging.

method.name: set_log_level_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables a specific log level.

method.name: set_success_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables success logging.

method.name: set_warning_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables warning logging.

method.name: variant_to_double_fp
method.description: Converts a fixed-point variant to a double value.
